column4: is there some application I can use to check if some of my partitions are bad?
have you tried gparted?
what says no partitions?
one second
okay... so...? lol i'm not sure what the problem is.  Can you not create partitions on the drive?

that's normal
has to do with how you create logical partitions
ah, I used the livecd I think at the time to create the partitions - originally where the extended partiton is, was a primary NTFS one
it's possible, but any time you have extended partitioning you're going to end up with that
right

it's magic and pixie dust necessary for the partitioning of your drive

hmm... sounds like the sabayon livecd is to blame
as for the pixie dust... you'll have to ask a programmer =)

use gparted
